allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: initial commit - complete OurArea event discovery app

Implement a full-featured Android application for discovering and creating geolocated events in real-time.

Core Features:
- Secure authentication system with PBKDF2 password encryption
- Session persistence using DataStore Preferences
- Google Maps integration with interactive markers
- Real-time geolocation with distance calculation
- Event creation with camera/gallery image support
- Category-based filtering (Music, Food, Art, Sports, etc.)
- Smart search functionality
- Material Design 3 UI with Jetpack Compose

Technical Implementation:
- MVVM architecture pattern
- Room database for local persistence
- Kotlin Coroutines and Flow for async operations
- Offline-first approach ready for Xano API integration
- Gallery permission request with custom dialog
- Enhanced logout confirmation modal with modern design
- Responsive layouts for portrait and landscape modes

Security:
- PBKDF2WithHmacSHA256 password hashing (10,000 iterations)
- API keys externalized to apikeys.properties (gitignored)
- ProGuard/R8 configuration for release builds
- Secure session management

Database Schema:
- users table: id, name, email, password (hashed)
- events table: comprehensive event data with categories and geolocation

Documentation:
- Comprehensive README with Xano API integration guide
- Installation and configuration instructions
- Database schema documentation
- Security best practices
- Project structure overview

Ready for cloud sync with Xano REST API backend integration.
EOF
